settings.privacySecurityInfo: Your privacy and security are very important to us. You can learn how your data is protected
settings.learnDataProtection: Learn how your data is collected, used, and protected.
settings.privacyPolicyContent:
Our privacy policy:

ğŸ“‹ Data Collection
â€¢ Your diary entries and notes are only accessible to you.
â€¢ Your email address is used for account management.
â€¢ Your profile information (name, bio) is optional.

ğŸ”’ Data Usage
â€¢ Your data is only used for the application to function.
â€¢ Your data is not shared with third parties.
â€¢ Not used for advertising or marketing purposes.

ğŸ›¡ï¸ Data Protection
â€¢ All data is stored encrypted.
â€¢ Stored on secure Supabase servers.
â€¢ Regular backups are performed.

ğŸ“ Contact
For questions: msesoftware1425@gmail.com
settings.seeDataUsageDetails: See in detail which of your data is used and how.
settings.dataTransparencyContent:
Data transparency information:

ğŸ“Š Collected Data
â€¢ Your diary entries (text, mood, tags)
â€¢ Your tasks and reminders
â€¢ Your dreams and goals
â€¢ Your profile information (name, bio)
â€¢ Your email address (for account management)

ğŸ” Data Usage
â€¢ Your data is only used for the application to function.
â€¢ Used for statistics and analysis.
â€¢ Used for notifications.
â€¢ Your data is not shared with third parties.

ğŸ—‘ï¸ Data Deletion
â€¢ You can delete your data at any time.
â€¢ When you delete your account, all your data is deleted.
â€¢ You can download your data using the data download feature.

ğŸ“ Contact
For questions: msesoftware1425@gmail.com

settings.startWithQuickSteps: Start with quick steps, find quick answers with FAQ.
settings.diaryInstructions: Press the "Write Today" button on the main page, write your feelings and thoughts.
settings.dreamVsGoal: What is the difference between Dream and Goal?
settings.dreamVsGoalAnswer: Dream is vision, goal is measurable step. Goals progress with milestones.
settings.promisesAnswer: Simple commitments you make to yourself. Increases confidence as you complete them.
settings.howToSetupNotifications: How do I set up notifications?
settings.notificationsAnswer: Manage morning/evening, silent hours and summary options from Settings > Notifications.
settings.themeChangeAnswer: You can change it instantly via Settings > Theme Selection.
settings.milestoneAnswer: Sub-tasks within goals. Percentage automatically increases as you mark them, mini celebration at 100%.
settings.dataBackupAnswer: Data is stored on device; use "Data Backup" screen for regular backups.
settings.languageChangeAnswer: Switch between Turkish/English via Settings > Language Selection.
settings.messagesPersonalAnswer: Messages become dynamic according to your mood and goal trends.
settings.wantToReportProblem: I want to report a problem.
settings.reportProblemAnswer: You can reach us from Settings > Help & Support section.
settings.diaryDescription: Touch "Write Today" on main page, note your feelings.
settings.dreamGoalDescription: Create new dream or goal from dreams screen.
settings.milestonesDescription: Percentage automatically increases as you complete subtasks within goals.
settings.notificationsDescription: Settings > Notifications: morning/evening, silent hours and summary.
settings.contactForSupport: Contact us for issues, suggestions or support.
settings.backupAndManageData: Back up and manage your data securely. All your diary entries,
settings.profileAndSettingsControlled: profile information and settings can be controlled from here.
settings.cloudSyncInfo: Your data is already stored on Supabase (cloud). All your data is safely stored in the cloud with your anonymous user ID. No email required!
settings.syncLocalDataDescription: If you have old data on your phone (from AsyncStorage), sync it to the cloud. New data is already automatically stored in the cloud.
settings.backupDiariesSecure: Securely back up your diaries and all your data to the Supabase cloud.
settings.restoreBackedUpData: Restore your backed-up data to your device.
settings.downloadPersonalDataJson: Download all your personal data in JSON format and store it elsewhere.
settings.deleteAllPersonalData: Delete all your personal data permanently. This operation cannot be undone!
settings.exportLocalData: Export data stored on this device to JSON format.
settings.importLocalData: Import data from previously exported JSON file.
settings.backupToSupabase: Back up all data to Supabase cloud storage.
settings.restoreFromSupabase: Restore your data from Supabase cloud backup.
settings.permanentlyDeleteAllData: Permanently delete all your data. This action cannot be undone!
settings.dataEncryptedStored: All your data is encrypted and stored on secure servers.
settings.dontForgetBackup: Don't forget to back up your data regularly.
settings.restoreDataWhenSwitching: Restore your data when switching to a new device.
settings.aboutContent:
Rhythm v1.0.0

ğŸµ Spiritual balance and life rhythm app:
â€¢ Daily journaling system
â€¢ Mood tracking and analysis
â€¢ Dreams & goals dashboard
â€¢ Tasks and reminders
â€¢ Pomodoro timer and focus mode
â€¢ Statistics and progress tracking
â€¢ Personality card system
â€¢ 14 different theme options
â€¢ Offline working
â€¢ Data backup

Developer: MSESOFT
Â© 2025

Contact: msesoftware1425@gmail.com
settings.helpSupportContent:
Frequently Asked Questions:

â“ How can I write a diary?
â€¢ Press the "Write Diary" button on the main page

â“ How can I backup my data?
â€¢ From Settings > Data & Backup section

â“ How can I change the theme?
â€¢ From Settings > Appearance section

â“ How can I set notifications?
â€¢ From Settings > Notifications section

For more help: msesoftware1425@gmail.com

onboarding.welcomeDescription: Rhythm invites you on a journey that makes you feel better every day. Write your diary, set your goals, track your progress
onboarding.routineDescription: Write daily, track your habits, observe your mood. Small steps create big differences
onboarding.themeDescription: Rhythm awaits you in two different worlds. Which one is closer to your energy?
onboarding.selectLanguageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the app
onboarding.luxuryThemeMessage: An elegant and modern atmosphere awaits you!
onboarding.yourInfo: Let's get to know each other! ğŸ’«

tour.dashboardWelcome: On this main screen, you can record your daily mood, create quick tasks, and track your progress.
tour.dashboardWriteDiary: Click this button to start writing your diary. Taking a few minutes each day helps you understand yourself better.
tour.dreamsGoals: Here you can record your dreams, goals, and promises to yourself. Tracking your progress increases your motivation.
tour.statistics: Here you can see your mood, habits, and overall progress with charts. Small steps every day create big changes.
tour.tasks: You can manage your daily tasks and reminders here. Remember, small tasks lead to big goals.
tour.settings: From here you can customize your language, theme, notifications, and other preferences. Customize the app to your liking!

insights.greatWeekDesc: Your average mood in the last 7 days is {avgMood}/5. You're doing great!
